pageProduct.name: Scholl Corn Clear Gel Plaster 6
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Natural treatment. With Hydraguard technology. Instant pain & pressure relief. Advanced gel protection.

Corn Shield Gel Plasters are advanced Corn protection plasters utilising a revolutionary dual layer Hydra-Guard™ Technology:



  1. The hard outer shield protects and guards the corn from friction and rubbing.

  2. The soft gel island provides advanced cushioning and actively donates water to the site of the corn, softening it, aiding removal.

  3. What are the benefits?



  • 100% Natural Corn Treatment

  • Easy to apply

  • Suitable for all hard corns

  • Stays firmly in place

  • Doesn't use harsh acids

Boxed Contents: 6 Pack

Size: 6

Warnings

If carton seal is broken do not use. Do not use after the expiry date. Discontinue use if discomfort or irritation occurs.

PRECAUTIONS

Keep out of reach of children.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Please SEEK ADVICE before using this product if you are Diabetic or have poor blood circulation, as your foot condition may require treatment by a Healthcare Professional.

Directions

Ensure feet are clean, dry and free from creams and oils. Step 1 remove backing film 1 and place plaster (adhesive side down) centrally over the corn. Step 2 Remove backing film 2 using the blue tab & gently smooth down adhesive edge to skin. Repeat treatment daily until corn can be removed. To remove, slowly stretch the plaster along the skin.

USAGE ADVICE

Do not apply to healthy skin. Do not use on broken or irritated skin.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

If carton seal is broken do not use. Do not use after the expiry date. Discontinue use if discomfort or irritation occurs.

Storage Temperature: Do not store above 25°C.
